On Jan PERIOD  Mississippi Gov PERIOD Tate Reeves signed a bill approving the redraw of Mississippis four congressional districts PERIOD

The commencement of this redistricting plan seeks to regulate the states increasing and decreasing district populations PERIOD

Ted Booth Staff Counsel of the Mississippi Standing Joint Legislative Committee on Reapportionment  Redistricting specified the developments around district elections and the state representatives involved PERIOD

 Booth said PERIOD

Booth noted the population growth of districts one four and three and the decline in District two as a factor in the necessity of redistricting PERIOD

 Booth said PERIOD

Booth explained how the boundaries of Oktibbeha County could see modifications ahead after being split amongst two congressional districts PERIOD

 Booth said PERIOD

Along with the redistricting of congressional districts Oktibbeha County has arranged to reform its supervisor districts to redistribute populations PERIOD

Toby Sanford manager of the GIS Department with the Golden Triangle Planning and Development District counted around  different areas where boundaries will be altered in the county PERIOD

 Sanford said PERIOD

Sanford clarified his role in the development of the redrawing and mentioned the two plans being considered currently PERIOD

 Sanford said PERIOD

Sanford emphasized the importance of regulating population numbers in these districts because of the federal requirements that strive for balance PERIOD

 Sanford said PERIOD

Sanford spoke of boundary adjustments near Avalon Apartments and the Rolling Hills subdivision due to both complexes being divided into separate districts PERIOD

 Sanford said PERIOD

Sanford projected changes to occur in West Starkville to accommodate the areas need for an additional voting center and accessible parking PERIOD

 Sanford said PERIOD

Sheryl Elmore Election Deputy Clerk of Oktibbeha County Circuit Court additionally highlighted the zone change on Lynn Lane to explain the importance of her position PERIOD

When the change occurs Elmore will be involved in readdressing the individuals to their assigned districts and notifying them of their new voting precinct PERIOD

 Elmore said PERIOD

Elmore highlighted the Board of Supervisors meeting on Feb PERIOD  as the publics way to gain more information and ask questions about what the plan will entail PERIOD
